Frederic Ewen Audiotape and Videotape Collection
Series II: Public Lectures and Performances
Series II: Public Lectures and Performances

This series consists of audio recordings of public lectures, dramatic readings, and performances presented and organized by Ewen in the 1950s and 1960s. The recordings include performances by Ruby Dee, Ossie Davis, John Randolph, and Sarah Cunningham.
